satish_gk@... wrote:
> 
> Hi ,
>      I want to know how you can use junit for testing java programs
> which involve database updates.
> 
>      I have a method which does multiple updates using a stored
> procedure.How do i test it using Junit ?.
> 
>       Can somebody please help ?

Run the stored proc, then run selects to determine that all the relevant
tables have been inserted/updated correctly.  You may have to filter out
uncontrolled variant data like timestamps and id columns.  This might
mean several calls, if you touch a bunch of tables.  If you're relying
on indexing to prevent bad data inputs, you should test the indexing
too, by deliberately testing with bad data.
